InstructionData.Title: PRVA - Pressure Relief Valve Array
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Pressure Relief Valve Array # PRVA-5 # Controls up to 5 pumps based on PID value. # PID 0-100=1 device, 101=200=2 devices, etc. # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library
alias GasSensor d0 alias device r0 alias maxDevices r1 alias pidout r2 alias setting r3 alias pressure r4 alias setpoint r5 alias error r6 alias kp r7 alias t0 r10
define maxDevices 5 move setpoint 100 # kPa move kp -10
start: # read current pressure l pressure GasSensor Pressure
# calculate pid sub error setpoint pressure mul error error kp move pidout error s db Setting error
move device 1 loop: sle t0 device maxDevices blez t0 done bdns dr0 increment updatedevice: blez pidout off min setting pidout 100 s dr0 On 1 s dr0 Setting setting j increment off: s dr0 On 0 s dr0 Setting 0 increment: sub pidout pidout 100 add device device 1 j loop done: yield j start
